about_the_game:
Laika, an IRL streamer, didn't find much success after nearly a year of content creation. After an embarrassing accident during one of her streams, her chat went wild, and after a couple of generous donations, she noticed her subscriber count went up!

With new subscribers needing to be entertained she decided to expand her activities to also post videos, but she needs ideas. 

Play as Laika, by managing her day-to-day activities. Brainstorm new ideas by going around the city to find inspiration, make videos, interact with viewers on stream, post pictures for your community to enjoy, and build Laika’s community through her social media!

Manage your sanity

The lower Laika’s sanity is the more activities she’s willing to do. How far you ask? Let’s just say there are few things Laika will let stand in the way of her fame.

Day and night cycle

Make videos during the day, and stream at night, that’s the daily grind of a girl seeking internet fame! Change between day and night to explore the city and encounter many events as Laika becomes more daring with her content.

Events / Recollection room

Laika will encounter many people, from strangers to her fans. Explore the city and hunt down events to progress her streaming journey and enjoy what shenanigans Laika gets up to in her videos and streams.

Prank People for Content

Balance between your chat’s entertainment and the alertness of the people you prank at night. The more you entertain the chat the more donations you’ll get, but the more alert the people you prank are, the greater the chance you’ll get caught and reported to the authorities.

Learn and improve your skills 

Learn from The Master and expand your skill tree so you can tackle the challenges of a small time content creator with lofty goals!

name: Exposed Livestream

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows® 7/8/8.1/10
  • Processor: Intel Core2 Duo or better
  • Graphics: DirectX 9/OpenGL 4.1 capable GPU
  • Storage: 500 MB available space

short_description: Stream by day, prank by night, and build your fame in this RPG adventure game! As IRL streamer Laika, create content, earn subscribers, and expand your skills. Explore the city and risk it all to entertain your growing audience. Show them what they actually want to see...
supported_languages:
English, Japanese*, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese
*languages with full audio support
